prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.parsha_theme: dreams, building from nothing, divine protection
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who releases the bound — free me from what holds me back.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 118:25: "Lord, save us! Lord, grant us success!"
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 16:3: "Commit your work to the Lord, and your plans will be established."
prayer.intention: Open doors that no one can shut, and close doors that would lead me astray.
prayer.closing: Baruch atah Adonai — Blessed are You, Lord, who renews creation daily with goodness.

mre.title: 📊 MRE Trading
mre.thesis: Fear at 45, bull regime intact. No BUY signals today — wait for Fear/Greed below 30 for optimal entries. Dow hit 50,000 milestone. Energy and gold showing strong momentum.

family.title: 💕 Family Focus
family.potency_action: Acknowledge what happened without defending: 'You're right, I shouldn't have...'
recommendations: PRIORITY: Focus on repair. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending.
Increase acts of service dramatically this week.
Create space for her to express frustrations without fixing.
